publicKeyResolver.title: JWKS resolver
publicKeyResolver.description: Define how the JSON Web Key Set is retrieved

titleMap.GIVEN_KEY: GIVEN_KEY: You must provide RSA Public Key as a resolver parameter
titleMap.GATEWAY_KEYS: GATEWAY_KEYS: Look for RSA Public Key from API Gateway configuration according to issuer and kid from incoming JWT
titleMap.JWKS_URL: JWKS_URL: Retrieve JWKS from URL (Basically, URL ending with '/.well-known/jwks.json')

resolverParameter.title: Resolver parameter
resolverParameter.description: Set the public key (GIVEN_KEY) or a JWKS URL (JWKS_URL) following selected resolver (support EL).

extractClaims.title: Extract JWT Claims
extractClaims.description: Put claims into the 'jwt.claims' context attribute.
